attributes.action: All UK children should receive their full immunisations recommended by the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: The government should legislate that children must be vaccinated unless a suitable medical professional advises that it wouldn't be in the best interests of the child. Vaccinated children are at risk themselves, but they also pose a risk to society as a whole, which relies on herd immunity.
attributes.background: Every year, thousands of parents choose not to vaccinate their children. They do this for a variety of reasons; they are rarely medical in nature. This leaves thousands of children in the UK vulnerable to diseases that should have been eradicated. This needs to change. Let's vaccinate all children.
